ygData.subject: RE: Made 45 last night and love my new song :)
ygData.msgSnippet: What strategy do you use when dueling pet users?  I ve been a little afraid to try it ;) Elwyn ... From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
ygData.messageBody:
What strategy do you use when dueling pet users? I've been a little afraid
to try it ;)


Elwyn

-----Original Message-----
From: Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)
[mailto:Michael.Garramone@...]
Sent: Wednesday, January 19, 2000 5:21 PM
To: 'eqbards@onelist.com'
Subject: RE: [eqbards] Made 45 last night and love my new song :)


From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <Michael.Garramone@...>

a jerk and stupid too i guess =) no way you'd be stunning me while playing
MR songs, which i always have going before accepting the duel =) DoTs and
DDs get through, but all or none spells, like root or stun etc, almost never
do. 50 v 50 with me having 120+ MR it's not gonna happen ;) never tried a
necro yet, too scared. but level 50 enchanter, cleric, shaman, druid,
wizard, magician i have all beat in duels.

Shada
